p: Humans, since time immemorial, have relied on herbs and other natural products for the recovery and prophylaxis of many illnesses. In addition to their effective potentials in the therapeutic features, herbal products are easier to obtain, less expensive, and more acceptable for people than synthetic medicines. However, herbs have risks and sometimes can lead to poisoning if not used properly, and some of them are inefficient in the treatment of certain emergency cases [ 1].
